磝字的基本解释

磝
áo
〔碻（
qi乷 ）磝〕见“碻2”。

磝
qiāo
古同“磽”，坚石。

磝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［áo］
［《廣韻》五交切，平肴，疑。］
见“磝磝”。
[②]［qiāo］
［《集韻》丘交切，平爻，溪。］
见“磝2衍”。

磝字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【石字部】　磝； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页835第14
【廣韻】五交切【集韻】【正韻】牛刀切【韻會】牛交切，?音聱。與嶅同。【釋名】山多小石曰磝。磝，堯也。每石堯堯獨處而出見也。【韓愈文】山磝磝而相軌。　又碻磝。詳碻字註。　【集韻】或作磽礉。

磝字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
磝字的起名意思

暂无。

áo

qi 乷) Sui] See "碻2".
Squint
qiāo
Ancient with "硗", solid stone.
Squint
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [áo]
["Guangyun" has five intersections, flat dishes, and doubts. ]
See "Surrounding".
[②]［qiāo］
["Ji Yun" Qiyun crosses, flat line, stream. ]
See "Sui 2 Yan".
Squint
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Afternoon Collection] [Stone Character Department] 　磝; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 835 14
[Guang Yun] Five cross cuts [Ji Yun] [Zheng Yun] Niu Knife Cut [Rhyme] Niu cross cuts,? Yin Zhen. Same as 嶅. [Release name] There are many small rocks and said, Sui. Look, Yao also. Every Shi Yaoyao came out alone. [Han Yuwen] The mountains are squinting and the phases are on track.　碻磝 again. Detailed note of the word.　【Ji Yun】Or make a 硗礉.
